snippet: A TV movie about the miracles wrought by workers in a dead-letter office, was created by the executive producer of “Touched by an Angel.”
abstract: Neil Genzlinger reviews television movie Signed, Sealed, Delivered on the Hallmark Channel.
lead_paragraph: A TV movie about the miracles wrought by workers in a dead-letter office, was created by the executive producer of “Touched by an Angel.”

headline.seo: ‘Signed, Sealed, Delivered,’ a Film on the Hallmark Channel
